name: Sfear
description:
This is a prototype mobile, multiplayer, Halloween themed game where players are playing tag.  Players run around on a sphere shaped map, trying to run from the player who is cursed (it).  At the end of the 60 second round, the player who was cursed for the shortest amount of time wins.

The game is not currently built for mobile, but PC controls are used to mimic phone interactions. To move, players click, hold, and flick their mouse to emulate a swiping motion.  If the player is cursed, they can double click (double tap) to briefly go invisible.

This project was made by:

Kevin Chase,  Melody Chung,  Amanda Osterkamp,  and Kenneth Yam
